016package com.exoreaction.xorcery.dns.client.providers;
017
018import com.exoreaction.xorcery.dns.client.api.DnsLookup;
019import org.apache.logging.log4j.LogManager;
020import org.apache.logging.log4j.Logger;
021import org.xbill.DNS.Record;
022import org.xbill.DNS.*;
023import org.xbill.DNS.lookup.LookupResult;
024import org.xbill.DNS.lookup.LookupSession;
025import org.xbill.DNS.lookup.NoSuchDomainException;
026import org.xbill.DNS.lookup.NoSuchRRSetException;
027
028import java.net.URI;
029import java.util.*;
030import java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture;
031import java.util.concurrent.ConcurrentHashMap;
032import java.util.concurrent.atomic.AtomicLong;
033import java.util.stream.Collectors;
034
035public class SRVLookup
036        implements DnsLookup {
037
038    private final LookupSession lookupSession;
039    private final Map<URI, List<URI>> currentUriMappings = new ConcurrentHashMap<>(); // Track current mapping from srv URI to list of URIs
040    private final Map<URI, Map<String, AtomicLong>> uriServerRequests = new ConcurrentHashMap<>(); // Track current request counts for URIs of a particular srv URI
041    private final Logger logger = LogManager.getLogger(getClass());
042
043    public SRVLookup(LookupSession lookupSession) {
044        this.lookupSession = lookupSession;
045    }
046
047    @Override
048    public CompletableFuture<List<URI>> resolve(URI uri) {
049
050        String authority = uri.getAuthority();
051        if (!authority.startsWith("_")) {
052            return CompletableFuture.completedFuture(Collections.emptyList());
053        }
054
055        try {
056            Name srvName = Name.fromString(authority);
057
058            // Convert scheme from name, e.g. _foobar._sub._https._tcp.somedomain.com -> https
059            String scheme = uri.getScheme();
060            for (int i = srvName.labels() - 1; i > 0; i--) {
061                if (srvName.getLabelString(i).equals("_tcp")) {
062                    scheme = srvName.getLabelString(i - 1).substring(1);
063                    break;
064                }
065            }
066            LookupResult srvLookupResult = lookupSession.lookupAsync(srvName, Type.SRV).toCompletableFuture().join();
067
068            if (srvLookupResult.getRecords().isEmpty()) {
069                return CompletableFuture.failedFuture(new NoSuchRRSetException(srvName, Type.SRV));
070            } else {
071                List<ServerEntry> servers = new ArrayList<>();
072                List<URI> serverURIs = new ArrayList<>();
073
074                // Get TXT record and extract path
075                LookupResult txtResult = lookupSession.lookupAsync(srvName, Type.TXT).toCompletableFuture().join();
076                String path = uri.getPath();
077                for (Record record : txtResult.getRecords()) {
078                    if (record instanceof TXTRecord txtRecord) {
079                        for (String txtRecordString : txtRecord.getStrings()) {
080                            if (txtRecordString.startsWith("self=")) {
081                                path = txtRecordString.substring("self=".length());
082                                break;
083                            }
084                        }
085                    }
086                }
087
088                Map<String, AtomicLong> serverRequests = uriServerRequests.computeIfAbsent(uri, u -> new ConcurrentHashMap<>());
089                for (Record record : srvLookupResult.getRecords()) {
090                    if (record instanceof SRVRecord srvRecord) {
091
092                        URI serverUri = new URI(scheme, uri.getUserInfo(), srvRecord.getTarget().toString(true), srvRecord.getPort(), path, uri.getQuery(), uri.getFragment());
093                        serverURIs.add(serverUri);
094                        servers.add(new ServerEntry(serverUri,
095                                srvRecord.getPriority(), serverRequests.computeIfAbsent(serverUri.getAuthority(), u -> new AtomicLong(1)).get(), srvRecord.getWeight()));
096                    }
097                }
098
099                // Sort based on priority and weight
100                if (!servers.isEmpty()) {
101                    Collections.sort(servers);
102                    if (logger.isTraceEnabled()) {
103                        logger.trace("Sorted {}: {}", uri, servers);
104                    }
105                    serverRequests.get(servers.get(0).uri().getAuthority()).incrementAndGet();
106                }
107
108                // Check if URI list has changed and we should reset the counts
109                List<URI> currentMappings = this.currentUriMappings.get(uri);
110                if (currentMappings == null) {
111                    currentUriMappings.put(uri, serverURIs);
112                } else if (!currentMappings.equals(serverURIs)) {
113                    // Mapping from SRV to list of URIs has changed, reset the request counts
114                    serverRequests.clear();
115                    currentUriMappings.put(uri, serverURIs);
116                    if (logger.isTraceEnabled()) {
117                        logger.trace("Reset request counts for {}", uri);
118                    }
119                }
120
121                return CompletableFuture.completedFuture(servers.stream().map(ServerEntry::uri).collect(Collectors.toList()));
122            }
123        } catch (Throwable e) {
124            if (e.getCause() instanceof NoSuchDomainException) {
125                return CompletableFuture.completedFuture(Collections.emptyList());
126            } else {
127                return CompletableFuture.failedFuture(e);
128            }
129        }
130    }
131
132    public record ServerEntry(URI uri, int priority, long requests, long weight)
133            implements Comparable<ServerEntry> {
134        @Override
135        public int compareTo(ServerEntry entry) {
136
137            if (entry.priority == priority) {
138
139                long totalWeight = entry.weight + weight;
140
141                // Same priority, use weight and the nr of requests so far
142                return Long.compare(100L * requests / (totalWeight - entry.weight), 100L * entry.requests / (totalWeight - weight));
143            }
144
145            // Lowest priority should come first
146            return Long.compare(priority, entry.priority);
147        }
148
149        @Override
150        public boolean equals(Object o) {
151            if (this == o) return true;
152            if (o == null || getClass() != o.getClass()) return false;
153            ServerEntry that = (ServerEntry) o;
154            return Objects.equals(uri, that.uri);
155        }
156
157        @Override
158        public int hashCode() {
159            return Objects.hash(uri);
160        }
161    }
162}
